message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offer and your counteroffer. How about we try $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet us in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $85, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $100?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $92.50?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $100, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between $100 and $92.50. How about we try $96.25?
I'm not sure if I'm willing to meet you at $96.25, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $96.25 and $92.50. How about we try $94.375?
I'm not willing to go any higher than $100, Bob. I'm going to make a new offer that's slightly higher than your last one. How about we try $97?
I'm still not willing to meet you at $97, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $97 and $94. How about we try $95.50?
